title: Engulfing Snare
s-hit: The creature is knocked aside by the snareâ€™s deployment, taking half damage, and is [[Flat-Footed]] until the end of its next turn.
s-fail: The creature is captured by the cage, taking full damage and falling prone. It is immobilized while it remains within the cage. It can get free by [[Escaping|Escape]] (DC 31) or by destroying the cage (Hardness 5, HP 30, object immunities).
s-fumble: As failure, but the creature takes double damage.
